data_table.description: EDIC. Retinopathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information: deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: COREFRAC
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction: was a refraction performed for both eyes?

variable.name: COPVARE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: poor visual acuity in right eye

variable.name: COPVALE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: poor visual acuity in left eye

variable.name: COENUCRE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: right eye enucleated

variable.name: COENUCLE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: left eye enucleated

variable.name: COOREFRE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: other reason for no right eye refraction

variable.name: COOREFLE
variable.description: B1. Distance subjective refraction. Specify reason if a refraction was not performed for eyes: other reason for no left eye refraction

variable.name: COSPHRE
variable.description: B2. Distance subjective refraction. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: sphere - right eye

variable.name: COSPHLE
variable.description: B2. Distance subjective refraction. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: sphere - left eye

variable.name: COCYLRE
variable.description: B2. Distance subjective refraction. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: cylinder - right eye

variable.name: COCYLLE
variable.description: B2. Distance subjective refraction. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: cylinder - left eye

variable.name: COAXISRE
variable.description: B2. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: axis - right eye

variable.name: COAXISLE
variable.description: B2. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: axis - left eye

variable.name: COZERORE
variable.description: B2. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: sphere, cylinder and axis all zero - right eye

variable.name: COZEROLE
variable.description: B2. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: sphere, cylinder and axis all zero - left eye

variable.name: COMYOPIA
variable.description: B3. Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: is there myopia greater than 7 diopters in one or both eyes?

variable.name: CODIST
variable.description: C1. Visual acuity measurements: distance between patient and chart (m)

variable.name: CO200RE4
variable.description: C2. Visual activity measurements ; number of letters correct at 4 meters; number of correct letters correct 20/200, right eye

variable.description: C3. Total numbers of correct letters at 1 meter - right eye

variable.description: C3. If total number correct at one meter is zero, were count fingers, hand motion, or perception present? Light - right eye

variable.description: C4. Will the left eye to be tested at 1 meter

variable.description: C4. Visual activity measurements. One meter; letters correct 5/200, left eye

variable.description: C4. Visual activity measurements. Number of letters correct at 1 meters, 5/160, left eye

variable.name: CO1MLE
variable.description: C4. Total number of correct letters at 1 meter - left eye

variable.name: COCTLE
variable.description: C4. If total number correct at one meter is zero: were count fingers, hand motion, or light perception present? Light - left eye

variable.name: COIOPRE
variable.description: D1. Intraocular pressure: right eye intraocular pressure (mm Hg)

variable.name: COIOPLE
variable.description: D1. Intraocular pressure: left eye intraocular pressure (mm Hg)

variable.name: COLENSRE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: right lens missing

variable.name: COLENSLE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: left lens missing

variable.name: COIRISRE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: iris neovascularization in right eye

variable.name: COIRISLE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: iris neovascularization in left eye

variable.name: COANGLRE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: angle neovascularization in right eye

variable.name: COANGLLE
variable.description: E. Slit-lamp examination: angle neovascularization in left eye

variable.name: COOPHRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: was the ophthalmoscopic examination of right eye fundus satisfactory?

variable.name: COOPHLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: was the ophthalmoscopic examination of left eye fundus satisfactory?

variable.name: COREASRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: reason ophthalmoscopic exam was unsatisfactory or could not be performed - right eye
variable.value: Corneal opacity secondary to neovascular glaucome
Posterior synechia prevent dilation of pupil

variable.name: COREASLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: reason ophthalmoscopic exam was unsatisfactory or could not be performed - left eye
variable.value: Corneal opacity secondary to neovascular glaucome
Posterior synechia prevent dilation of pupil

variable.name: COCLARRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: clarity of right lens
variable.value: No lens opacity or some lens opacity but not sufficient to expect reduced visual acuity
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity but not to less than 20/100
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity to less than 20/100

variable.name: COCLARLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: clarity of left lens
variable.value: No lens opacity or some lens opacity but not sufficient to expect reduced visual acuity
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity but not to less than 20/100
Lens opacity sufficient to reduce visual acuity to less than 20/101

variable.name: COHEMRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: vitreous or retinal hemorrhage - right eye

variable.name: COHEMLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: vitreous or retinal hemorrhage - left eye

variable.name: COOBSCRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: hemorrhage obscures one or more disc area - right eye

variable.name: COOBSCLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: hemorrhage obscures one or more disc area - left eye

variable.name: CO7STDRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: hemorrhage obscures one or more disc area, within 7 standard fields - right eye

variable.name: CO7STDLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: hemorrhage obscures one or more disc area within 7 standard fields - left eye

variable.name: COOUT7RE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination. Indicate areas in which vitreous or preretinal hemorrhage obscures one or more disc areas of retina: outside 7 standard fields - right eye

variable.name: COOUT7LE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination. Indicate areas in which vitreous or preretinal hemorrhage obscures one or more disc areas of retina: outside 7 standard fields - left eye

variable.name: COANTRRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination. Indicate areas in which vitreous or preretinal hemorrhage obscures one or more disc areas of retina: anterior to vortex ampullae - right eye

variable.name: COANTRLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination. Indicate areas in which vitreous or preretinal hemorrhage obscures one or more disc areas of retina: anterior to vortex ampullae - left eye

variable.name: CONVDRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are new vessels present on or within one disc (NVD)? - right eye

variable.name: CONVDLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are new vessels present on or within one disc (NVD)? - left eye

variable.name: COSNVDRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are the vessels greater than or equal to DRS Standard Photo 10A? - Right eye

variable.name: COSNVDLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are the vessels greater than or equal to DRS Standard Photo 10A? Left eye

variable.name: CONVERE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are new vessel elsewhere present (NVE)? Right eye

variable.name: CONVELE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are new vessel elsewhere present (NVE)? Left eye

variable.name: COWNVERE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are there new vessels within the seven standard fields? Right eye

variable.name: COWNVELE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are there new vessels within the seven standard fields? - left eye

variable.name: COONVERE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are there new vessels outside the seven standard files? Right eye

variable.name: COONVELE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are there new vessels outside the seven standard files? Left eye

variable.name: COSNVERE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are the new vessels greater than or equal to 1/2 DA in size? Right eye

variable.name: COSNVELE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: are the new vessels greater than or equal to 1/2 DA in size? Left eye

variable.name: COTHIKRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: retinal thickening - right eye

variable.name: COTHIKLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: retinal thickening - left eye

variable.name: COCNTRRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: center of macula is involved - right eye

variable.name: COCNTRLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: center of macula is involved - left eye

variable.name: COCYSTRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: cystoid changes present - right eye

variable.name: COCYSTLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: cystoid changes present - left eye

variable.name: COHRCRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: high risk characteristics - right eye

variable.name: COHRCLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: high risk characteristics - left eye

variable.name: COPLANRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: plan to photocoagulate right eye

variable.name: COPLANLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: plan to photocoagulate left eye

variable.name: COREFRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: patient refuses laser - right eye

variable.name: COREFLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: patient refuses laser - left eye

variable.name: COUNHMRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: unable to laser right eye due to hemorrhage
variable.value: Unable to laser right eye due to hemorrhage

variable.name: COUNHMLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: unable to laser left eye due to hemorrhage
variable.value: Unable to laser left eye due to hemorrhage

variable.name: COUNORRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: unable to laser right eye - other reason
variable.value: Unable to laser left eye - other reason

variable.name: COUNORLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: unable to laser left eye - other reason
variable.value: Unable to laser left eye - other reason

variable.name: COPREFRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: prefer not to laser right eye
variable.value: Prefer not to laser right eye

variable.name: COPREFLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: prefer not to laser left eye
variable.value: Prefer not to laser left eye

variable.name: COOLASRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: other reason for not lasering right eye
variable.value: Other reason for not lasering right eye

variable.name: COOLASLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: other reason for not lasering left eye
variable.value: Other reason for not lasering left eye

variable.name: COABNRE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: other major ophthalmoscopic abnormality - right eye

variable.name: COABNLE
variable.description: F. Ophtalmoscopic examination: other major ophthalmoscopic abnormality - left eye

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID
